pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets Related to Hong Kong // Datasets related to Hong Kong, including information on the 2019 elected District Councillors (https://www.districtcouncils.gov.hk and https://dce2019.hk01.com/) and traffic collision data from the Hong Kong Department of Transport (https://www.td.gov.hk/). All of the data in this package is available in the public domain.
